metadata.title: CVE-2021-47341 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: KVM:mmio: Fix use-after-free Read in kvm_vm_ioctl_unregister_coalesced_mmioBUG: KASAN: use-after-free inkvm_vm_ioctl_unregister_coalesced_mmio+0x7c/0x1ecarch/arm64/kvm/../../../virt/kvm/coalesced_mmio.c:183 Read of size 8 ataddr ffff0000c03a2500 by task syz-executor083/4269 CPU: 5 PID: 4269     Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47341` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
